Title: A Wizard a True Star: Todd Rundgren in the studio
Author: Paul Myers
My Review: Really well researched details of Todd's work in the recording studio producing artists like Robbie Robertson, Patti Smith, XTC, Sparks, Hall & Oates, Meat Loaf, Cheap Trick, Grand Funk, The Psychedelic Furs, The Tubes, Todd's solo works, and his own band Utopia. Lots of great interviews with the artists and Todd himself. A really great read.
